9b093729-22b0-4585-ac45-dd9be669867e.description: The badge earner has learned what conversational AI is through exploration of use cases, areas of applications and best practices. They understand the AI concepts around the Vonage AI Studio, such as Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) and Natural Language Understanding (NLU), and demonstrated how to use AI in action with a mini virtual agent project built on the platform.
9b093729-22b0-4585-ac45-dd9be669867e.name: AI Champion Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Vonage employee
Must deliver Virtual Agent Demo to the Champions Team
Manager validation required

7ab1b6c1-f6c2-454f-b888-6fb323952924.description: This badge is designed to provide foundational knowledge of diversity, equity and inclusion. All Vonage team members play a role in shaping our Vonage Way Culture, and those who complete this badge will gain a greater understanding of our ethos “Our Differences Make Us Stronger.” This badge will equip team members with the knowledge around diversity in the workplace, and learn how to show up as an ally for those around them.
7ab1b6c1-f6c2-454f-b888-6fb323952924.name: Diversity Ally

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Vonage employee
Successful completion of a minimum of 3 LearningHub courses from the DE&I Bundle
Attend a minimum of 3 company sponsored or external DE&I events
Provide proof of completion with this 2 question form.

badge_template_activities.title: Quarterly each team will be measured on the below (weighted): Highest Team Attainment v Quota (75%) + % of team above 80% (25%)

623f2d3e-45a3-474c-a636-ef71292b432e.description: This badge is for members of the Seller Experience Advisory Team who participated, engaged and provided valuable input throughout the 6-9 month rotation, all with the goal of a better seller experience in mind.
623f2d3e-45a3-474c-a636-ef71292b432e.name: SEAT Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a member of SEAT, through the nomination of senior leadership

Attend and participate in 2 meetings per quarter on specific strategic initiatives. Pre-read materials prior to meetings. Engage fully in conversation and provide feedback. Participate in activities, such as piloting new programs.

56558fe1-c4a9-4813-8826-22defb427f66.description: Provide useful content in the form of knowledge-share sessions
56558fe1-c4a9-4813-8826-22defb427f66.name: Source of Knowledge

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Vonage Solutions Engineer
Individual to provide content for at least 3+ Internal Knowledge sharing meetings (Knowledge Share / Lunch and Learn / One-off). Sessions must be recorded and documented in Confluence

b3c24714-aa22-4df9-aef9-a97e8300ad56.description: Mentors are important leaders in our Vonage community. They demonstrate the Vonage Way through their commitment to enabling others to reach their full potential. Earners of this badge are recognized for their dedication to mentoring in either the Vonage Open Mentoring Program, the Vonage New Team Member Buddy Program, or an external mentoring program.
b3c24714-aa22-4df9-aef9-a97e8300ad56.name: Vonage Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Vonage Team Member
Must complete MentorLab Training in MentorHub
Must complete InclusionLab Training in MentorHub
Spent 25 total hours mentoring in one or both of the Vonage Mentoring Programs or an external mentoring program
Submit your hours as evidence in the Slack channel #mentor-badge-request-channel through the automated workflow.
